languages.text: "Пустотное братство счастливо найти в великоперсоне Вольного Торговца покровител{mf|я|ьницу}. Оно поручило мне передать скромные дары, что будут полезны для вашей экспедиции, а также продемонстрируют наше {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}особое почтеннорасположение{/d} к вашей персоне".

"The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."
languages.original_text: "Пустотное братство счастливо найти в великоперсоне Вольного Торговца покровител{mf|я|ьницу}. Оно поручило мне передать скромные дары, что будут полезны для вашей экспедиции, а также продемонстрируют наше {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}особое почтеннорасположение{/d} к вашей персоне".

traits.locale_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our special defereverence toward your person."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

traits.locale_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: “能得到光辉伟绩的行商浪人保护，虚空协联感到兴高采扬。协联高层委托我为您带来这些微薄的礼物。这些礼物除了表示我们对您的{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}特别尊拜{/d}之外，还会对您的远征有所帮助。”
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."

traits.locale_text: “虚空协联很高兴能得到伟大的行商浪人保护，协联高层委托我为您带来这些微薄的礼物。这些礼物除了表示我们对您的特别敬意之外，还会对您的远征有所帮助。”
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: 「虚空の仲間はもっとも偉大で高名な自由開拓者の保護を受けることができて、心から喜んでいます。私の任務は、遠征に役立つささやかな贈り物を運んでくることです。これはあなたのご身分に対する{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}特別な敬意{/d}の証でもあります」
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."

traits.locale_text: 「虚空の仲間はもっとも偉大で高名な自由開拓者の保護を受けることができて、心から喜んでいます。私の任務は、遠征に役立つささやかな贈り物を運んでくることです。これはあなたのご身分に対する{d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}特別な敬意{/d}の証でもあります」
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: «La Hermandad del Vacío está encantada de contar con la protección {mf|del|de la} grandios{mf|o|a} e ilustre Comerciante Independiente. Me han encomendado traerle estos modestos regalos que le serán de utilidad en su expedición, además de ser una muestra de {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}nuestra deferencia{/d} hacia usted».
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."

traits.locale_text: «La Hermandad del Vacío está encantada de contar con la protección {mf|del|de la} grandios{mf|o|a} e ilustre Comerciante Independiente. Me han encomendado traerle estos modestos regalos que le serán de utilidad en su expedición, además de ser una muestra de nuestra deferencia hacia usted».
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Die Gefährten der Leere sind europhorisch, den Schutz {mf|des großen und illustrierten Freihändlers|der großen und illustrierten Freihändlerin} zu genießen. Sie haben mich beauftragt, Euch diese bescheidenen Geschenke zu bringen, die Euch auf Eurer Expertition helfen sollen. Außerdem ein Geschenk für Euch persönlich als Zeichen {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}unseres Rehspecks{/d}."
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gefährten der Leere sind europhorisch, den Schutz {mf|des großen und illustrierten Freihändlers|der großen und illustrierten Freihändlerin} zu genießen. Sie haben mich beauftragt, Euch diese bescheidenen Geschenke zu bringen, die Euch auf Eurer Expertition helfen sollen. Außerdem ein Geschenk für Euch persönlich als Zeichen unseres Rehspecks."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: « La Communauté du vide est exaltationnée de bénéficier de la protection de l'{mf|illustreux libre-marchand|illustreuse libre-marchande}. En {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}gage de défévérence{/d}, j'ai été chargé de vous apporter ces modestes présents qui pourraient vous être utiles au cours de votre expédition. »
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."

traits.locale_text: « La Communauté du vide est exaltationnée de bénéficier de la protection de l'{mf|illustreux libre-marchand|illustreuse libre-marchande}. En gage de défévérence, j'ai été chargé de vous apporter ces modestes présents qui pourraient vous être utiles au cours de votre expédition. »
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: "Uçsuz Kardeşliği, pek değerli ve pek ulu Hür Tacir'in koruması altında olmaktan kıvanç duyuyor. Bana, şahsınıza duyduğumuz {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}özel saygının{/d} bir nişanesi olarak keşif seferinizde işinize yarayacak bu mütevazı armağanları iletme görevi verildi."
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void is elationed to have the great and illustratious Rogue Trader's protection. It has tasked me with bringing you these modest gifts that will be of use to you on your expedition, besides being a token of our {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}special defereverence{/d} toward your person."

traits.locale_text: "Uçsuz Kardeşliği, pek değerli ve pek ulu Hür Tacir'in koruması altında olmaktan kıvanç duyuyor. Bana, şahsınıza duyduğumuz {d|Encyclopedia:PiratesRep_Max}özel saygının{/d} bir nişanesi olarak, keşif seferinizde işinize yarayacak bu mütevazı armağanları iletme görevi verildi."
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor
